channel.title: Comments on: The New York Times Is Preparing For The Future

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: I think they're targeting their print subscribers more who pay something like $40 a month for daily paper delivery.
item.content:encoded: I think they’re targeting their print subscribers more who pay something like $40 a month for daily paper delivery.

item.title: By: Justin Thorp
item.dc:creator: Justin Thorp
item.description: Hmm... still not sure if its worth $14.95/month.
item.content:encoded: Hmm… still not sure if its worth $14.95/month.

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description:
"why should I use it and pay money"?
Because the Times Reader is gorgeous and the experience rocks. Plus you can download and sync the content so you can read it offline, like on a plane.
item.content:encoded:
“why should I use it and pay money”?

Because the Times Reader is gorgeous and the experience rocks. Plus you can download and sync the content so you can read it offline, like on a plane.

item.title: By: Justin Thorp
item.dc:creator: Justin Thorp
item.description: The Times Reader is gorgeous. The experience rocks but why should I use it and pay money over just getting the news off their Web site?
item.content:encoded: The Times Reader is gorgeous. The experience rocks but why should I use it and pay money over just getting the news off their Web site?
